_description: Configuration for protein-protein docking using PyRosetta DockingProtocol

_parameter_descriptions.trajectories: Number of docking trajectories to run
_parameter_descriptions.chain_break: Residue number where chain A ends (auto-detect if null)
_parameter_descriptions.use_centroid_stage: Whether to use centroid (low-resolution) docking stage
_parameter_descriptions.use_fullatom_stage: Whether to use fullatom (high-resolution) docking stage

quick_docking.description: Fast docking using only fullatom stage
